description.0: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

0.0: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by <cryo>10/20/30/48%</cryo>. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.
